job.title: Remote Full Stack Engineer
job.description:
If you are a Full Stack Engineer with experience, please read on!
We are a non profit looking to change the lives of students that have a difficulty learning. We provide tools to educators that help them transform the way they teach and the way the students learn. We help educators identify the learning issues early on and then work to help the prevent them in the future. Our award winning software is helping students all over the world and helping to make a real difference in the education system!
What You Will Be Doing
You will set technology standards and direct the execution of the initiatives from inception through implementation. You will be working with the engineering teams to solve problems and establishing and improving internal processes. You will directly contribute to the growth and development of the software team by providing guidance and coaching to your peers.
What You Need for this Position
5+ years of experience as a software engineer
Experience delivering commercially deployed SaaS solutions
Deep understanding of Object-Oriented Programming and Design
Experience with Distributed Systems
Proficient with Node.JS and related frameworks
In depth knowledge of TypeScript and JavaScript
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Experience with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Experience managing CI/CD tools
Experience deploying applications via CI/CD piplinges
Experience managing Docker, Kubernetes, or other container systems
What's In It for You
Salary $120k - $130k
Fully remote
Medical, Dental, Vision and life Insurance
401K plan
FSA Account
So, if you are a Full Stack Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Zack.Waltz@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : ZW1-1645589 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Zack Waltz - Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
